title: Pendant, "Charm in the form of an egg", 1880–1900
markings: Marks on pendant loop "HV" in square, 56__"
creditline: Gift of Charlotte Y. Salisbury in loving memory of her husband, Harrison E. Salisbury
description: Egg-shaped, enameled with white hearts on dark green background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pendant, "Charm in the form of an egg", 1880–1900.
1880–1900. Gold, enamel. Gift of Charlotte Y. Salisbury in loving memory of her husband, Harrison E. Salisbury. 1995-15-2.
